bibl.title: New Light on the Literary Category of 'Ekphrastic Epigram' in Antiquity: The New Posidippus (col. X 7 - XI 19 P. Mil. Vogl. VIII 309).
bibl.note: P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309, coll. x, 7 - xi, 19. Focuses on col. x, 30-33 = 65 Austin-Bastianini.
ZANKER Graham, New Light on the Literary Category of 'Ekphrastic Epigram' in Antiquity: The New Posidippus (col. X 7 - XI 19 P. Mil. Vogl. VIII 309).
